Body.Content:
We are announcing the Use Copilot to analyze desktop flow runs feature for Power Automate. This feature allows users to ask questions about cloud flow and desktop flow activity, work queues, and Power Automate features. This feature will reach general availability on January 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature allows Copilot within automation center to answer questions about desktop flow run history and view Copilotâ€™s insightful analysis of desktop flow run history.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Automation center (preview).

Title: Power Automate - Use Copilot to analyze desktop flow runs
